### getFP16Imm() {#ab23f031bf813c9284ac27776b414a867}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static int llvm::AArch64&#95;AM::getFP16Imm (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; Imm)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
